abilities.name: The Best Defense...
abilities.description: Doomfist generates temporary personal shields when he deals ability damage. Grants 30/70 temporary shield per enemies hit, but decays at a rate of -3HP per second.

abilities.name: Hand Cannon
abilities.description: Doomfist fires a short-range burst from the knuckles of his fist. Its ammunition is automatically regenerated over a short time.

abilities.name: Rocket Punch
abilities.description: After charging up, Doomfist lunges forward and knocks an enemy back, dealing additional damage if they impact a wall.

abilities.name: Rising Uppercut
abilities.description: Doomfist uppercuts enemies in front of him into the air.

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.description: Doomfist leaps forward and smashes into the ground, knocking nearby enemies toward him. Damage scales with the distance traveled during the slam.

abilities.name: Meteor Strike
abilities.description: Doomfist leaps into the sky, then crashes to the ground, dealing significant damage. Doomfist is invincible during his ultimate. Deals 300 damage at the center, 10 at the rim.

abilities.name: Cyber-Agility
abilities.description: Thanks to his cybernetic abilities, Genji can climb walls and perform jumps in mid-air.

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Genji looses three deadly throwing stars in quick succession.

abilities.name: Fan of Blades
abilities.description: Alternatively, he can throw three shuriken in a wider spread.

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.description: Genji dashes in the direction of the cursor, dealing damage to every enemy he passes through. The cooldown is refreshed if he kills someone.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description: While the ability is active, any frontal ranged attack will be deflected in the direction of Genji's crosshairs. Using Swift Strike or Dragonblade will cancel Deflect.

abilities.name: Dragonblade
abilities.description: Genji brandishes his katana for a brief period of time. Until he sheathes his sword, Genji can deliver killing strikes to any targets within his reach.

abilities.name: Peacekeeper
abilities.description: McCree fires off a round from his trusty six-shooter.

abilities.name: Fan the Hammer
abilities.description: He can fan the Peacekeeper’s hammer to swiftly unload the entire cylinder.

abilities.name: Combat Roll
abilities.description: McCree dives in the direction he’s moving, effortlessly reloading his Peacekeeper in the process.

abilities.name: Flashbang
abilities.description: McCree heaves a blinding grenade that explodes shortly after it leaves his hand. The blast stuns and slows enemies in a small radius.

abilities.name: Deadeye
abilities.description: McCree takes a few precious moments to aim; when he’s ready to fire, he shoots every enemy in his line of sight. The weaker his targets are, the faster he’ll line up a killshot.

abilities.name: Hover Jets
abilities.description: Hold to hover. Uses a resource meter that recharges automatically when not in use.

abilities.name: Rocket Launcher
abilities.description: Pharah’s primary weapon launches rockets that deal significant damage in a wide blast radius.

abilities.name: Jump Jet
abilities.description: Propelled by her suit’s thrusters, Pharah soars high into the air.

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.description: Pharah looses a wrist rocket that knocks back any enemies it strikes.

abilities.name: Barrage
abilities.description: The rockets cover a large area in the direction of the player's crosshair. The player must remain stationary while the ability is active.

abilities.name: The Reaping
abilities.description: Regains 20% of all damage done to heroes as health

abilities.name: Hellfire Shotguns
abilities.description: Reaper tears enemies apart with twin shotguns.

abilities.name: Wraith Form
abilities.description: Reaper becomes a shadow for a short period of time. While in this form, he takes no damage and is able to pass through enemies, but cannot fire his weapons or use other abilities.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: After marking a destination, Reaper disappears and reappears at that location.

abilities.name: Death Blossom
abilities.description: In a blur of motion, Reaper empties both hellfire shotguns at breakneck speed, dealing massive damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Heavy Pulse Rifle
abilities.description: Soldier: 76’s rifle remains particularly steady while unloading fully-automatic pulse fire.

abilities.name: Helix Rockets
abilities.description: Tiny rockets spiral out of Soldier: 76’s Pulse Rifle in a single burst. The rockets’ explosion damages enemies in a small radius.

abilities.name: Sprint
abilities.description: Whether he needs to evade a firefight or get back into one, Soldier: 76 can rush ahead in a burst of speed. His sprint ends if he takes an action other than charging forward.

abilities.name: Biotic Field
abilities.description: Soldier: 76 plants a biotic emitter on the ground. Its energy projection restores health to 76 and any of his squadmates within the field.

abilities.name: Tactical Visor
abilities.description: Allows Soldier: 76's aim to home in on targets in a circle around his crosshairs and will switch targets if line of sight to the original target is interrupted. Using the ability also increases the reload speed of 76's Pulse Rifle while active.

abilities.name: Opportunist
abilities.description: When an enemy's health is below 100%, Sombra can see their health bars. When an enemy's health is below 50%, Sombra can see their silhouette through walls. This effect is only visible to Sombra. Her team does not share this vision, so it is up to the Sombra player to communicate this information.

abilities.name: Machine Pistol
abilities.description: Sombra’s fully-automatic machine pistol fires in a short-range spread.

abilities.name: Hack
abilities.description:
Hacking an enemy will interrupt any channeled effects (including ultimates) and prevent the activation of abilities, including a Hero's Passive. Hacked enemies also have their health bar and ultimate status revealed for a longer duration.
Hacked health packs respawn much faster (small health packs in 2.5 seconds, large health packs in 3.5 seconds), and can't be picked up by enemies.

stats.name: Hack Duration
stats.value:
Hero Ability: 6
HP/Ult Status Reveal: 20
Health Packs: 60
Turret: 10

abilities.name: Thermoptic Camo
abilities.description: Sombra turns completely invisible to enemies and her movement speed is increased. Being damaged or using her weapon or offensive abilities will cancel the effect. Sombra announces her presence upon becoming visible again.

abilities.name: Translocator
abilities.description: Sombra tosses out a translocator beacon. She can instantly return to the beacon’s location while it is active (including when it’s in mid-flight).

abilities.name: EMP
abilities.description: Sombra discharges electromagnetic energy in a wide radius, destroying enemy barriers and shields and hacking all opponents caught in the blast.

abilities.name: Pulse Pistols
abilities.description: Tracer rapid-fires both of her pistols.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Tracer zips horizontally through space in the direction she’s moving, and reappears several yards away. She stores up to three charges of the blink ability and generates more every few seconds.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: Tracer bounds backward in time, returning her health and position on the map to precisely where they were a few seconds before.

abilities.name: Pulse Bomb
abilities.description: Tracer lobs a large bomb that adheres to any surface or unfortunate opponent it lands on. After a brief delay, the bomb explodes, dealing high damage to all enemies within its blast radius.

abilities.name: Ironclad
abilities.description: Reduce damage taken while transformed.

abilities.name: Configuration: Recon
abilities.description: In Recon mode, Bastion is fully mobile, outfitted with a submachine gun that fires steady bursts of bullets at medium range. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Configuration: Sentry
abilities.description: In Sentry mode, Bastion is a stationary powerhouse equipped with a gatling gun capable of unleashing a hail of bullets. The gun's aim can be "walked" across multiple targets, dealing devastating damage at short to medium range. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Self-Repair
abilities.description: Bastion restores its health; it cannot fire weapons while the repair process is in effect.

abilities.name: Reconfigure
abilities.description: Bastion transforms between its two primary combat modes to adapt to changing battlefield conditions.

abilities.name: Configuration: Tank
abilities.description: In Tank mode, Bastion extends wheeled treads and a powerful long-range cannon. The cannon’s explosive shells demolish targets in a wide blast radius, but Bastion can only remain in this mode for a limited time.

abilities.name: Wall Climb
abilities.description: Hanzo can climb any vertical surface.

abilities.name: Storm Bow
abilities.description: Hanzo nocks and fires an arrow at his target. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Sonic Arrow
abilities.description: Hanzo launches an arrow that contains a sonar tracking device. Any enemy within its detection radius is visibly marked, making them easier for Hanzo and his allies to hunt down. Arrow itself does the same damage as Storm Bow, and can also headshot.

abilities.name: Scatter Arrow
abilities.description: Hanzo shoots a fragmenting arrow that ricochets off walls and objects and can strike multiple targets at once.

abilities.name: Dragonstrike
abilities.description: Hanzo summons a Spirit Dragon which travels through the air in a line. It passes through walls in its way, devouring any enemies it encounters.

abilities.name: Total Mayhem
abilities.description: Junkrat's deranged sense of humor persists past his death. If killed, he drops several live grenades.

abilities.name: Frag Launcher
abilities.description: Junkrat's Frag Launcher lobs grenades a significant distance. They bounce to reach their destination, and blow up when they strike an enemy. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Concussion Mine
abilities.description: After placing one of his homemade Concussion Mines, Junkrat can trigger it to damage enemies and send them flying... or propel himself through the air.

abilities.name: Steel Trap
abilities.description: Junkrat tosses out a giant, metal-toothed trap. Should an enemy wander too close to the trap, it clamps on, injuring and immobilizing them.

abilities.name: RIP-Tire
abilities.description: Junkrat revs up a motorized tire bomb and sends it rolling across the battlefield, climbing over walls and obstacles. He can remotely detonate the RIP-Tire to deal serious damage to enemies caught in the blast, or just wait for it to explode on its own.

abilities.name: Endothermic Blaster
abilities.description: Mei’s blaster unleashes a concentrated, short-range stream of frost that damages, slows, and ultimately freezes enemies in place.

abilities.name: Icicle
abilities.description: Mei can also use her blaster to shoot icicle-like projectiles at medium range.

abilities.name: Cryo-Freeze
abilities.description: Mei instantly surrounds herself with a block of thick ice. She heals and ignores damage while encased, but cannot move or use abilities.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.description: Mei generates an enormous ice wall that obstructs lines of sight, stops movement, and blocks attacks.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Mei deploys a weather-modification drone that emits gusts of wind and snow in a wide area. Enemies caught in the blizzard are slowed and take damage; those who linger too long are frozen solid.

abilities.name: Scrap Collector
abilities.description: Torbjorn can obtain scrap from the deaths of enemies and teammates. Torbjorn also passively generate scrap at a rate of 1 scrap every 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Rivet Gun
abilities.description: Torbjorn fires a single arcing rivet. Reloads itself when secondary weapon is equipped for 2.1s. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Rivet Gun (Alt Fire)
abilities.description: Torbjörn ejects molten metal from his gun in a shotgun-like burst. Reloads itself when secondary weapon is equipped for 2.1s. Can headshot

abilities.name: Forge Hammer
abilities.description: Torbjörn uses his multipurpose hammer to build, upgrade and repair turrets. In a pinch, it can also be swung as a weapon.

abilities.name: Build Turret
abilities.description: Torbjörn constructs an enemy-tracking autocannon. He can use his Forge Hammer to repair or upgrade it, increasing its health and adding a second cannon barrel. Takes 5 hammer hits at max health to upgrade to level 2. Turret cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Armor Pack
abilities.description: Torbjörn uses scrap to create and  deploys an armor upgrade; either he or his allies can pick it up to absorb some damage.

abilities.name: Molten Core
abilities.description: On activation Torbjörn gains increased max health in the form of bonus armor, extra attack speed, and if his turret is level 2, it is upgraded to level 3 for the duration.

abilities.name: Widow's Kiss: Sniper
abilities.description: Widowmaker’s versatile sniper rifle is ideal for scope-aimed shots at distant targets. 2.5x headshot multiplier (0.5 more than all other heros).

abilities.name: Widow's Kiss: Assault
abilities.description: Should targets close to medium range, the rifle can also be fired in fully-automatic mode. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Grappling Hook
abilities.description: Widowmaker launches a grappling hook towards the location she’s aiming at – when the hook connects with a scalable surface, she’s quickly drawn towards it.

abilities.name: Venom Mine
abilities.description: Widowmaker adheres a swiftly-arming venom mine to nearly any surface. When a target wanders within range of the mine’s motion trigger, it explodes, delivering poison gas to any enemies in the vicinity.

abilities.name: Infra-Sight
abilities.description: Widowmaker’s recon visor allows her to see the heat signatures of her targets through walls and objects for a moderate amount of time. This enhanced vision is shared with her allies.

abilities.name: Eject
abilities.description: D.Va ejects out of her mech when it is destroyed.

abilities.name: Fusion Cannons
abilities.description: D.Va's mech is equipped with twin short-range rotating cannons. They lay down continuous, high-damage fire without needing to reload, but slow D.Va’s movement while they’re active.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: D.Va can activate this forward-facing targeting array to shoot incoming projectiles out of the air. Uses a resource meter that recharges automatically when not in use.

abilities.name: Boosters
abilities.description: D.Va’s mech launches into the air, her momentum carrying her forward. She can turn and change directions or barrel through her enemies, knocking them back.

abilities.name: Micro Missles
abilities.description: D.Va fires a barrage of small rockets that detonate on impact, dealing damage in a limited radius around each explosion.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: D.Va ejects from her mech and sets its reactor to explode, dealing massive damage to nearby opponents.

abilities.name: Light Gun (Pilot)
abilities.description: While outside of her mech, D.Va can continue the fight with a mid-range automatic blaster. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Call Mech (Pilot)
abilities.description: While outside of her mech, D.Va can continue the fight with a mid-range automatic blaster. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Fusion Driver
abilities.description: Orisa’s automatic projectile cannon delivers sustained damage, but slows her movement while she fires it.

abilities.name: Halt!
abilities.description: Launch a graviton charge which can be detonated with the same action. The sphere slows and pulls nearby enemies to it.

abilities.name: Fortify
abilities.description: Orisa temporarily reduces damage she takes and cannot be affected by movement-impairing effects.

abilities.name: Protective Barrier
abilities.description: Orisa throws out a stationary barrier that can protect her and her allies from enemy fire.

abilities.name: Supercharger
abilities.description: Orisa deploys a device to increase damage inflicted by allies within her line of sight.

abilities.name: Rocket Hammer
abilities.description: Reinhardt’s Rocket Hammer is an exemplary melee weapon, able to deal punishing damage in a wide arc with every swing. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Barrier Field
abilities.description: Reinhardt projects a broad, forward-facing energy shield, which can absorb substantial damage before it is destroyed. Though Reinhardt can protect himself and his companions behind the shield, he cannot attack while sustaining it.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Reinhardt propels himself forwards at significant speed but with reduced ability to turn. Charge ends after a period of time or when Reinhardt collides with a solid surface. The first enemy Reinhardt collides with during his charge is "pinned" to Reinhardt, and is dealt heavy damage if Reinhardt then impacts a solid surface. All other enemies are knocked away from him.

abilities.name: Fire Strike
abilities.description: By whipping his Rocket Hammer forward, Reinhardt slings a flaming projectile which pierces and damages any enemies it touches.

abilities.name: Earthshatter
abilities.description: Reinhardt forcefully slams his rocket hammer into the ground, knocking down and damaging all enemies in front of him.

abilities.name: Scrap Gun
abilities.description: Roadhog's Scrap Gun fires short-range blasts of shrapnel with a wide spread. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Shrapnel Ball (Alt Fire)
abilities.description: Alternatively, it can launch a shrapnel ball (projectile) that detonates farther away, scattering metal fragments from the point of impact. Can headshot. If the shrapnel ball hits before scattering, it will only deal 50 damage and cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Chain Hook
abilities.description: Roadhog hurls his chain at a target; if it catches, he yanks them into close range (3.5m).

abilities.name: Take a Breather
abilities.description: Roadhog restores a chunk of his health over a brief period of time.

abilities.name: Whole Hog
abilities.description: After cramming a top-loader onto his Scrap Gun, Roadhog pours in ammo. For a short time, he can crank out a stream of shrapnel that knocks back enemies. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Tesla Cannon
abilities.description: Winston’s weapon fires a short-range electric barrage for as long as he holds down the trigger. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Jump Pack
abilities.description: Assisted by his energy pack, Winston lunges through the air, dealing damage and staggering nearby enemies when he lands.

abilities.name: Barrier Projector
abilities.description: Winston’s barrier projector extends a bubble-shaped field that absorbs damage until it's destroyed. Allies protected by the barrier can return fire from within it.

abilities.name: Primal Rage
abilities.description: Winston embraces his animal nature, significantly boosting his health and making him very difficult to kill, strengthening his melee attack, and allowing him to use his Jump Pack ability more frequently. While raging, Winston can only make melee and Jump Pack attacks.

abilities.name: Energy
abilities.description: Damage blocked increases Particle Cannon damage.

abilities.name: Particle Cannon
abilities.description: Zarya’s mighty Particle Cannon unleashes a short-range beam of destructive energy. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Particle Cannon (Alt Fire)
abilities.description: Alternatively, Zarya can lob an explosive charge to strike multiple opponents. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Particle Barrier
abilities.description: The Particle Cannon can emit a personal barrier that shields Zarya against incoming damage and debuffs, redirecting their energy to enhance her weapon’s damage and the width of its beam. The barrier, although only has 200 hit points, will absorb all of one burst damage even if it's higher than 200. For example, Tracer's ult will be completely absorbed even if it does 400 damage.

abilities.name: Projected Barrier
abilities.description: Zarya surrounds one of her teammates with an energy barrier that simultaneously absorbs fire and boosts the power of her Particle Cannon. Functions identical to Particle Barrier.

abilities.name: Graviton Surge
abilities.description: Zarya launches a gravity bomb that draws in enemy combatants and deals damage while they’re trapped. Disables movement abilities such as Tracer's Blink.

abilities.name: Biotic Rifle
abilities.description: The Biotic Rifle shoots darts that will heal allied heroes or apply 0.9 second damage-over-time (DOT) to enemy units. The dart is a fast moving projectile if fired from the hip, and a hitscan shot if firing while scoped. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Biotic Rifle (Scope)
abilities.description: She can use the rifle’s scope to zoom in on targets and make highly accurate shots. The dart is a fast moving projectile if fired from the hip, and a hitscan shot if firing while scoped. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Sleep Dart
abilities.description: After a short delay, Ana fires a fast moving dart from her sidearm. An enemy hit is stunned for a few seconds, but the effect is immediately broken if the target takes damage.

abilities.name: Biotic Grenade
abilities.description: Ana tosses a biotic bomb that deals damage to enemies and heals allies in a small area of effect. Affected allies briefly receive increased healing from all sources, while enemies caught in the blast cannot be healed for a few moments.

abilities.name: Nano Boost
abilities.description: After Ana hits one of her allies with a combat boost, they deal more damage and take less damage from enemies’ attacks.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: When Brigitte strikes an enemy with her flail, all allies within range are healed over time.

abilities.name: Rocket Flail
abilities.description: Brigitte's melee weapon has an extended range, enabling her to strike multiple enemies with a single swing. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Barrier Shield
abilities.description: Brigitte deploys a frontal energy barrier to absorb a limited amount of damage.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.description: Once her Barrier Shield is deployed, Brigitte can dash forward to stun an enemy.

abilities.name: Whip Shot
abilities.description: Brigitte throws her flail a long distance, dealing damage and knocking an enemy away from her. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Repair Pack
abilities.description: Brigitte throws a Repair Pack that can heal an ally. Any healing over that ally’s maximum health provides them with armor instead. This armour does get removed after some time if not destroyed.

abilities.name: Rally
abilities.description: Brigitte moves faster and provides all nearby allies with armor that lasts until it’s removed by damage.

abilities.name: Wall Ride
abilities.description: Jump onto a wall while holding space to ride along it at 7.7m/s. Lucio receives a burst of speed when leaping off a wall. After releasing from a wall, Lúcio cannot immediately Wall Ride any wall facing the same direction, including the original.

abilities.name: Sonic Amplifier
abilities.description: Lúcio can hit his enemies with sonic projectiles. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Soundwave
abilities.description: Lúcio can knock his enemies back with a blast of sound. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Crossfade
abilities.description: Lúcio continuously energizes himself — and nearby teammates — with music. He can switch between two songs: one amplifies movement speed, while the other regenerates health.

abilities.name: Amp It Up
abilities.description: Lúcio increases the volume on his speakers, boosting the effects of his songs.

abilities.name: Sound Barrier
abilities.description: Protective waves radiate out from Lúcio’s Sonic Amplifier, briefly providing him and nearby allies with personal shields.

abilities.name: Renegeration
abilities.description: Mercy automatically heals over time.

abilities.name: Angelic Descent
abilities.description: Propelled by her Valkyrie suit, Mercy slows the speed of her descent from great heights.

abilities.name: Caduceus Staff
abilities.description: Mercy engages one of two beams that connect to an ally. By maintaining the beams, she can either restore that ally's health or increase the amount of damage they deal.

abilities.name: Caduceus Blaster
abilities.description:
Mercy shoots a fast moving projectile from her sidearm. It's best reserved for emergency personal defense.
Can headshot.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Mercy flies towards a targeted ally, allowing her to reach them quickly and provide assistance in crucial moments.

abilities.name: Resurrect
abilities.description: Mercy radiates restorative power, bringing nearby dead allies back into the fight with full health. Mercy is slowed significantly while performing resurrection.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description:
Valkyrie unleashes the full power of Mercy’s Valkyrie suit, enhancing her weapons and abilities for a limited duration.
 - Regeneration (Passive): Can't be interrupted
 - Hover: Mercy can now fly freely, at increased speed
 - Caduceus Staff: Increased range, multi-target
 - Caduceus Blaster: ∞ ammo, increased projectile speed
 - Guardian Angel: Increased range and speed

abilities.name: Biotic Grasp: Renegeration
abilities.description: Using her left hand, Moira expends biotic energy (resource meter) to heal allies in front of her. Biotic energy passively recharges over 45 seconds, which can be sped up using Moira's alternate fire.

abilities.name: Biotic Grasp: Decay
abilities.description: Her right hand fires a long-range beam weapon that saps enemies’ health, healing Moira and replenishing her biotic energy. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Fade
abilities.description: Moira quickly teleports a short distance while invulnerable to damage.

abilities.name: Biotic Orb
abilities.description: Moira launches a rebounding biotic sphere; she can choose between a regeneration effect that heals the allies it passes through, or a decay effect that deals damage to enemies. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Coalescence
abilities.description: Moira channels a long-range beam that both heals allies and bypasses barriers to damage her enemies. While channeling this ability, Moira's movement speed increases greatly, but she cannot perform any other actions. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Photon Projector
abilities.description: Symmetra’s weapon emits a short-range beam that homes in on a nearby enemy, dealing continuous damage that increases the longer it is connected. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Energy Ball
abilities.description: The projector can also release a slow-moving charged energy ball that deals high damage. The longer Symmetra spent charging it, the more damage it deals. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Sentry Turret
abilities.description: Symmetra sets up a small turret that automatically fires speed-reducing blasts at the nearest enemy within range. Several turrets can be built on the battlefield at once.

abilities.name: Photon Barrier
abilities.description: Symmetra projects a moving barrier that absorbs damage as it travels forward.

abilities.name: Teleporter
abilities.description: Symmetra places a teleporter exit pad at her current location, and connects it to a teleporter entry pad at her team’s starting point. Allies can travel through the entry pad to the exit pad instantly, enabling them to return to the fight swiftly after being defeated.

abilities.name: Shield Generator
abilities.description: Symmetra deploys a wide-radius generator that provides increased shielding to her entire team.

abilities.name: Orb of Destruction
abilities.description: Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs individually. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Orb Volley
abilities.description: Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs in a rapid-fire volley after a few seconds spent gathering power. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Orb of Harmony
abilities.description: Zenyatta casts an orb over the shoulder of a targeted ally. So long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight, the orb slowly restores health to his ally. Only one ally can receive the orb's benefit at a time.

abilities.name: Orb of Discord
abilities.description: Attaching the orb of discord to an opponent amplifies the amount of damage they receive for as long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight. Only one opponent can suffer the orb's effects at a time.

abilities.name: Transcendence
abilities.description: Zenyatta enters a state of heightened existence for a short period of time. While transcendent, Zenyatta cannot use abilities or weapons, but is immune to damage and automatically restores his health and that of nearby allies.
